---
title: About
description-meta: "About Hussain Hadah"
# date: 2023-05-12
title-block-banner: "#006747"
# published-title: CV last updated
engine: knitr 
---


I am an applied microeconomist with a strong focus on labor economics. My passion lies in the field of Applied Microeconomics, where I delve into various topics such as discrimination, race, identity, mental health, and immigration.

Starting in July 2023, I will be joining Tulane University as a post-doctoral fellow.

In my free time, I enjoy running with my two dogs, watching college and professional sports, and trying new restaurants.

Thank you for visiting my website, and I invite you to explore further to learn more about my research and interests.

<!-- In July 2023, I will be joining Tulane University as a Postdoctoral Fellow. -->

### Research Interests

- Applied Microeconomics
- Labor Economics
